title: Malignant Melanoma Diagnosis and Patient Management Competency Enhancement Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Small-scale customized education for social science graduate students conducted on mobile devices, featuring case-based learning environments to strengthen practical competencies for students/job seekers

learning_goals: Three or more suspicious symptoms of malignant melanoma can be accurately identified through skin lesion case analysis
Learners can determine the appropriate timing for patient transfer with over 80% accuracy in a clinical judgment simulation based on provided patient information
Learners can correct their diagnostic decision-making errors two or more times using a feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
